legal_basis: subsection 25(1.3) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
evidence_assessment: self-confinement and its impact on the family
procedure_followed: Judicial review application assessed statutory interpretation and reasonableness of the decision
result_of_case: Decision overturned; case remanded for reconsideration
conclusion_outcome: The application for judicial review is allowed, and the matter is referred to a different officer for redetermination
